str2: (including the other inflections); from toi and houtos; truly this, i.e. Of this sort (to denote character or individuality).
Confidence, trust, reliance. From the perfect of the alternate of pascho; reliance.
To, towards, with. A strengthened form of pro; a preposition of direction; forward to, i.e. Toward.
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Plural
str2: To have, hold, possess. Including an alternate form scheo skheh'-o; a primary verb; to hold.
A primary preposition denoting the channel of an act; through.
Anointed One; the Messiah, the Christ. From chrio; Anointed One, i.e. The Messiah, an epithet of Jesus.
